attributes.action: To criminalise the act of defiling the Union Flag by burning or otherwise.
attributes.additional_details: Such action is already criminalised in other countries, for example France and Germany.
attributes.background: Such an act is Both disrespectful and offensive to the Crown and to the British people.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325545
